meanings.sent1: The student misstamped the date on his homework assignment.
meanings.sent2: The postal worker misstamped the package, causing a delay in delivery.
meanings.sent3: The misstamped letter ended up in the wrong mailbox, much to the confusion of the recipient.
meanings.sent4: Her memory misstamped the events of that day, making it difficult to recall the details accurately.
meanings.sent5: The misstamped coin was deemed a collector's item due to its unique error.

meanings.sent1: The misstamped envelope had the wrong address written on it.
meanings.sent2: The misstamped passport caused issues at the airport security checkpoint.
meanings.sent3: The misstamped ticket led to confusion at the concert entrance.
meanings.sent4: Her misstamped signature on the document raised doubts about its authenticity.
meanings.sent5: The misstamped seal on the letter made it look unprofessional.

meanings.definition: An item that has been stamped incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The collector was disappointed to find a misstamped coin in the set.
meanings.sent2: The misstamped postcard had a smudged image due to the error.
meanings.sent3: The misstamped letter became a topic of conversation among the office staff.
meanings.sent4: The misstamped document had to be reprinted to correct the mistake.
meanings.sent5: The misstamped package was returned to the sender for proper stamping.
